name: Greg Miller
tagline: Software engineer, amateur astronomer, hobby physicist
body:
### About
I've worked as an engineer at Google for over 10 years. I currently work on the C++ Library Team, where I primarily focus on fixing time and time-zone-related programming issues. See https://github.com/google/cctz which is an open source version of an internal library that @devbww and I developed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
